description: The 2021 UEC European Track Championships (under-23 & junior) will be the 21st continental championships for European under-23 and junior track cyclists, and the 12th since the event was renamed following the reorganisation of European track cycling in 2010. The event will take place at the Omnisport Apeldoorn in Apeldoorn, Netherlands from 17 to 22 August 2021.
title: 2021 UEC European Track Championships (under-23 & junior)
